data.caption: MVREF A multi-view reference video showing: [Front View] detailed front features, [Side View] side profile, [Bottom View] bottom details, [Top View] top surface, with smooth transitions between views
MVREF Multi-angle footage: [Front View] front-facing elements, [Back View] rear components, [Left View] left side, [Right View] right side, [Top View] overhead, [Bottom View] underside
MVREF A comprehensive reference: [Front View] primary face, [Side View] lateral view, [Bottom View] base details, with complete 360-degree coverage
MVREF Multi-view documentation: [Front View] frontal details, [Top View] top-down perspective, [Bottom View] bottom surface, showing all angles systematically
